StyleEngine¶

class aqt::stylesheets::StyleEngine¶

Interface to the singleton StyleEngine.

Create and setup the style engine for the application. There must be a single instance of this class for a complete application only. Trying to create more than one instance will print a warning leaving the first instance untouched.

The style engine supports up to two stylesheets specified by the styleSheetSource and defaultStyleSheetSource properties. Rules from the former take precedence of the those from the later.

Example
ApplicationWindow {
  StyleEngine {
    styleSheetSource: "../Assets/bright.css"
    defaultStyleSheetSource: "Resources/default.css"
  }
}
Import in QML:
Since
1.0

Signal

signal aqt::stylesheets::StyleEngine::styleChanged

Fires when the style sheet is replaced or changed on the disk.

signal aqt::stylesheets::StyleEngine::styleNameChanged

Fires when a new style sheet file name is set to the styleName property.

signal aqt::stylesheets::StyleEngine::defaultStyleNameChanged

Fires when a new default style sheet file name is set to the styleName property.

signal aqt::stylesheets::StyleEngine::fileExtensionsChanged

Fires when a new set of file extensions are set to the fileExtensions property.

signal aqt::stylesheets::StyleEngine::availableStylesChanged

Fires when the list of style sheets in the stylePath folder changes.

signal aqt::stylesheets::StyleEngine::styleSheetSourceChanged

Emitted when the style sheet source URL changes.

Since
1.1

signal aqt::stylesheets::StyleEngine::defaultStyleSheetSourceChanged

Emitted when the default style sheet source URL changes.

Since
1.1

signal aqt::stylesheets::StyleEngine::exception

Emitted when any part of the style sheet subsystem has to report some exceptional situation.

Since
1.1
Parameters
  • type -

    Indicates a type of exception, like “font-not-found”, etc.

  • message -

    Some descriptive message

Property

property aqt::stylesheets::StyleEngine::stylePath

Contains the URL of folder containing style sheets.

The URL is resolved relative to the location of the QML file in which the StyleEngine is instantiated. It must resolve to a local file path. The StyleEngine is actively watching this folder. Appearing or disappearing style sheet file will fire availableStylesChanged() signals.

property aqt::stylesheets::StyleEngine::styleName

Contains the file name of the current style sheet.

The style sheet file is actively watched and, if changing, reloaded. New or changing properties will fire styleChanged(int) signals. There’s no need though to actively monitor this signal since properties requested via the StyleSet attached type will automatically connect to the style engine.

The style sheet file name can be set during app runtime. This will load the new style sheet and update all StyleSet.props in the app accordingly.

See
styleName property

property aqt::stylesheets::StyleEngine::defaultStyleName

Contains the file name of the default style sheet.

See
styleName property

property aqt::stylesheets::StyleEngine::fileExtensions

Defines the list of support file extensions.

Only files with these extensions will be found as style sheets. Default is *.css only.

property aqt::stylesheets::StyleEngine::availableStyles

Contains the list of all style sheet files found in the stylePath folder.

Contains all files in the folder given by the stylePath property. Only files ending in the *.css extension are listed.

Whenever the list of style sheet files in the watch folder (given by the stylePath property) is changed the availableStylesChanged() signal will be fired.

The most like usage of this property is to build a style sheet chooser (Implementing a style sheet menu).

property aqt::stylesheets::StyleEngine::styleSheetSource

Contains the source url of the current style sheet.

The style sheet file is actively watched and, if changing, reloaded. New or changing properties will fire styleChanged(int) signals. There’s no need though to actively monitor this signal since properties requested via the StyleSet attached type will automatically connect to the style engine.

The style sheet url can be set during app runtime. This will load the new style sheet and update all StyleSet.props in the app accordingly.

The URL is resolved relative to the location of the QML file in which the StyleEngine is instantiated.

Since
1.1

property aqt::stylesheets::StyleEngine::defaultStyleSheetSource

Contains the source url of the default style sheet.

See
styleSheetSource property
Since
1.1
